enumdef.name: lv_buttonmatrix_ctrl
enumdef.help: Control flags you can apply to individual buttons

enum.name: none
enum.help: Make the button use the default state with no special control

enum.name: width_1
enum.help: Make the button take 1 unit of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_2
enum.help: Make the button take 2 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_3
enum.help: Make the button take 3 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_4
enum.help: Make the button take 4 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_5
enum.help: Make the button take 5 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_6
enum.help: Make the button take 6 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_7
enum.help: Make the button take 7 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_8
enum.help: Make the button take 8 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_9
enum.help: Make the button take 9 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_10
enum.help: Make the button take 10 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_11
enum.help: Make the button take 11 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_12
enum.help: Make the button take 12 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_13
enum.help: Make the button take 13 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_14
enum.help: Make the button take 14 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: width_15
enum.help: Make the button take 15 units of relative width in its row

enum.name: hidden
enum.help: Make the button hidden

enum.name: no_repeat
enum.help: Disable long-press repeat on the button

enum.name: disabled
enum.help: Make the button disabled (not clickable)

enum.name: checkable
enum.help: Make the button toggleable when clicked

enum.name: checked
enum.help: Keep the button in the toggled (checked) state

enum.name: click_trig
enum.help: Trigger LV_EVENT_VALUE_CHANGED on CLICK instead of PRESS

enum.name: popover
enum.help: Show a popover when pressing the button

enum.name: recolor
enum.help: Enable text recoloring with inline #color codes

enum.name: reserved_1
enum.help: Reserved flag for future use

enum.name: reserved_2
enum.help: Reserved flag for future use

enum.name: custom_1
enum.help: Custom flag free to use by the user

enum.name: custom_2
enum.help: Custom flag free to use by the user

prop.name: map
prop.help: Set the layout map of the button matrix using text strings and `\n` for line breaks (e.g. 'a' 'b' 'c')

prop.name: ctrl_map
prop.help: Set the control flags for each button in the map

prop.name: one_checked
prop.help: Force exactly one button to stay checked at all times

prop.name: selected_button
prop.help: Select a button by index (new lines do not count)
